<< parsefile interpreter functions switch >>

parsestring

Parse a string.

Syntax

status = parsestring(str)

Input argument

str

a string: a string to parse.

Output argument

status

a string: 'script', 'function', 'error'.

Description

parsestring parse a string and returns if it is a valid script, a valid function or an error.

Example

parsestring('1 + 1')
parsestring('1 +++ 1')
parsestring('1 +*+ 1')

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
